text: Hray 77zhy <THNf mifeqzrut TM9 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 MI (83r War7 a) {roTHrf 4A1T4) Yncr Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 HT National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) i-5 & 6, #er-10 , ERGTT , 7 fcrit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAI Policy Guidelines/ Implementation of Court Order 2019 No.2.1.30/2019 dated the 19th August, 2019 (Decision Taken in File No. NHAI/11041/280/2018/Coord) Sub: Serious observation by the Hon'ble High Court regarding delay in depositing the amounts as directed by the Court While deciding on an application of NHAI seeking condonation of delay in depositing the amount in compliance of the order of the Court in OMP (Comm) 51/2016 between NHAI VS. Oriental Structural Engineers Pvt. Ltd_ pertaining to PIU, NHAI, Jhansi, Hon'ble Court, vide its Order dated 16.07.2019, has taken a very serious note of the fact that there are numerous applications filed by NHAI in various matters seeking  condonation of delay in depositing the amounts, as directed by the Court: In above case, Hon'ble Court vide Order dated 15.02.2019 had directed to deposit the certain amount within 4 weeks, however , the DD was made only o 03.06.2019 and handed over to the Advocate of NHAI for depositing only on 02.07.2019. There was a delay of 86 days in complying with the order of the Court by the PIUIHQ of NHAI; 2 Hon'ble Court has verbally communicated through the Advocate of NHAI, as word of caution, that if in future such application comes, the same would not be entertained: 3, In view of above, all concerned in PIUs/ROs/HQ are advised that the amount as directed by the Hon'ble Court should be deposited in time prescribed by Court failing which disciplinary action will be initiated against the concerned in future.
